DOC.brief_summary: The overall, broad objective of this study is to pilot the BSD technique. The specific purpose of this particular study is to generate pilot data to validate several crucial steps of the BSD technique, in particular steps 1, 2, and 4. Radiation treatments will proceed per standard of care, and will not be modified in any way during this protocol. This study is a non-treatment protocol.
DOC.brief_title: Validation of a Novel Thoracic Neoplasm Radiotherapy Image Guidance Technique: A Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: Any thoracic neoplasm scheduled to undergo radiation therapy 18 years or older Must be treated with radiation as part of standard of care Able to tolerate the mouthpiece for spirometry and video glasses Ability to provide written informed consent
